tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Converts various input formats (HTTP/HTTPS web pages, local files, and data URIs) into structured Markdown.

    Args:
        input_source: The source to convert (e.g., "https://example.com", "file:///path/to/file.html", or "data:text/html,...").
        preserve_structure: If True, retains original formatting (default: True).

    Returns:
        A string containing the structured Markdown output.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the input source is invalid or unsupported.
        httpx.HTTPStatusError: If fetching web content fails.
        FileNotFoundError: If local file cannot be found.
        PermissionError: If local file cannot be accessed.

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Valid Web Page to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具可以将一个有效的HTTP网页转换为结构化的Markdown格式

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Local HTML File to Markdown with Default Preserve Setting
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具可以将本地HTML文件转换为Markdown，并使用默认的preserve_structure参数

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Conversion failed: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: '/D:/devWorkspace/MCPServer-Generator/testSystem/testFiles/present.html'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具可以将内联的data URI格式HTML内容转换为Markdown
